root.name: Taito Memories Gekan
root.description: Also known as "Taito Memories Volume 2", this game is a collection of 25 games on one disc that range from 1978 to 1997.Listed GamesThese are that games that's on this collection.Space InvadersDeluxe Space InvadersCrazy BalloonBalloon BomberQixWild WesternFront LineElevatorChack'n'PopThe Legend of KageKiwi KrazeNastar WarriorsRaimaisInspector XCadashViolence FightGun FrontierFootball ChampLiquid KidsArabian MagicSpace Invaders' 95GekirindanBust-A-Move 2RayStormG-Darius
